price: Na tukawamiminia mvua. Basi tazama jinsi ulivyo kuwa mwisho wa wakosefu.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: Basi tuliwateremshia mvua ya mawe ya kuteketeza, na ardhi ikatandazwa kwa mitetemeko ya chini yao! Basi ewe Nabii! Angalia vipi ulikuwa mwisho wa wakosefu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
